title: New: Absence – Visions (Feat. Bijou)
body:
_but I don’t want to be found / say you know about love_

Currently anonymous producer **Absence** teams up with female vocalist [Bijou](https://soundcloud.com/bijoudream) for their debut track, _Visions_. A glistening, ethereal number, relying upon the minimal nature of the vocals and the over-pronounced beat, it’s the next step up from the clutch of ‘bedroom producers’ that are doing the rounds as we speak, in that there’s an unmatched confidence and elegance to it. Check it out below.

A glistening, ethereal number, relying upon the minimal nature of the vocals and the over-pronounced beat, it’s the next step up from the clutch of ‘bedroom producers’ \[…\]
